Translation.Please enter your username and password: Please enter your username and password
Translation.Video Subject: Video Subject (Provide a keyword, :red[AI will automatically generate] video script)
Translation.Script Language: Language for Generating Video Script (AI will automatically output based on the language of your subject)
Translation.Generate Video Script and Keywords: Click to use AI to generate [Video Script] and [Video Keywords] based on **subject**
Translation.Video Script: Video Script (:blue[① Optional, AI generated  ② Proper punctuation helps with subtitle generation])
Translation.Generate Video Keywords: Click to use AI to generate [Video Keywords] based on **script**
Translation.Please Enter the Video Subject: Please Enter the Video Script First
Translation.Generating Video Script and Keywords: AI is generating video script and keywords...
Translation.Video Keywords: Video Keywords (:blue[① Optional, AI generated ② Use **English commas** for separation, English only])
Translation.Custom Background Music File: Please enter the file path for custom background music:
Translation.Background Music Volume: Background Music Volume (0.2 represents 20%, background music should not be too loud)
Translation.Enable Subtitles: Enable Subtitles (If unchecked, the settings below will not take effect)
Translation.Custom: Custom position (70, indicating 70% down from the top)
Translation.Video Script and Subject Cannot Both Be: Video Subject and Video Script cannot both be empty
Translation.You can download the generated video fro: You can download the generated video from the following links
Translation.Get Help: If you need help, or have any questions, you can join discord for help: https://harryai.cc
Translation.Voice Example: This is an example text for testing speech synthesis
Translation.No voices available for the selected TTS: No voices available for the selected TTS server. Please select another server.
Translation.Volume: Uses Speech Volume setting, defa: Volume: Uses Speech Volume setting, default 1.0 maps to gain 0
Translation.Hide Basic Settings:
Hide Basic Settings

Hidden, the basic settings panel will not be displayed on the page.

If you need to display it again, please set `hide_config = false` in `config.toml`
